verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:4
verses.text: And Jehoshaphat said unto the king of Israel, Enquire, I pray thee, at the word of the Lord to day.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:5
verses.text: Therefore the king of Israel gathered together of prophets four hundred men, and said unto them, Shall we go to Ramoth–gilead to battle, or shall I forbear? And they said, Go up; for God will deliver it into the king’s hand.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:6
verses.text: But Jehoshaphat said, Is there not here a prophet of the Lord besides, that we might enquire of him?
